title: EMPEROR Three & Four Bedroom Apartment For Sale.
details:
Luxury 4 Bedroom Penthouse apartment for Immediate SALE At Emperor At Crescat City.

It is a 4 Bedroom, 4 Toilets, Pantry Kitchen, Large Living Area and a Stunning Long balcony facing sea view.

Large Living & Dining area with a Large kitchen.

This is a fully furnished apartment.

Same compound as Cinnamon Grand (5 star hotel with multiple restaurant, Ansana spa + Gym)

Keels super market � Crescat Shopping Mall

Laundry + shopping facility � Crescat shopping mall

24 hours security

Designated parking

For Viewing And Other Further Information Of The Apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us

Web Site: www.menavid.com
